name: Ore Adventure
description:
Ore Adventure

Hi i´m Criss and i´m from the HTK,

This is my first game and i hope you like it.

Ore Adventure is an 2d platformer with the task to collect ores and find a treasure.  You have to jump over many obstacles and fight some enemys.  If you dare to find the treasure you have been warned, the enemys will not make it easy for you.

So grab your pickaxe, go into the cave and search for the treasure.

 

Controls

( A&D or left stick ) to go left or right

( space or button south on gamepad ) to jump

( E or button west on gamepad ) to attacke

( Esc or start button on gamepad ) to pause

Credits

Game by Christian Frank

Pizza Boy by Gotti

Sounds from Epidemic Sound
